subject: John Deere Classic (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Chez Reavie shot a 62 to take a two-stroke lead over Steve Marino and Steve Stricker in the second round of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill. J
snippet: Chez Reavie shot a 62 to take a two-stroke lead over Steve Marino and Steve Stricker in the second round of the John Deere Classic in Silvis, Ill. J
